GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.19.12
GSD.description:
bonding: fix NULL deref in bond_rr_gen_slave_id

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 2c8e8ab53acfc78da0b4a65f30cb5d306e7d78f7, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 848ca9182a7d25bb54955c3aab9a3a2742bf9678. For more details please see the references link.
